content.rendered:
Directed by Daniel Stamm

Written by Robert Zappia. Robert Zappia. Todd R. Jones. Earl Richey Jones

Star Jacqueline Byers(Sister Ann). Virginia Madsen(Dr. Peters). Colin Salmon(Father Quinn). Nicholas Ralph(Father Raymond). Ben Cross(Cardinal Matthews). Christian Navarro(Father Dante). Debora Zhecheva(Young Ann). Tom Forbes(Matt). Lisa Palfrey(Sister Euphemia). Posy Taylor(Natalie). Velizar Binev(Father Bernhard). Cora Kirk(Emilia). Owen Davis(Emcee At Pub).Koyna Ruseva. Ivan Rangelov(Priest). Anton Dimitrachkov(Priest). Elizabeth Gibson(Sister Kylie). Martin Taskov(Priest). Daria Mitusheva((voice)).Emona Ilieva. Lazar Kirilov(Priest). Christian Levchev(Priest). Tedi Dinh(Priest). Zheliazko Isakov(Priest)

Language English

Producers David Brooks. Paul Brooks. Valentin Dimitrov. Michael P. Flannigan. Earl Richey Jones. Todd R. Jones. Brad Kessell. Jeff Levine. Jessica Malanaphy. Scott Niemeyer

Production Confluence Productions. Gold Circle Films. Lionsgate
